Governor Mike DeWine makes #downsyndrome a priority for #covid19 optional vaccines! Congratulations & thank you to Ohio #downsyndrome organizations, including @ArcofOhio @DSACO_CBus @DSAGC @dsatoledo @DownSFirst @UpSideofDownsOH
